content.text:
<task>
Document the new Git workflow and contribution guidelines.

1.  **Update `docs/QUICK-REF.md`**:
    *   Add a section on "Development & Contributing".
    *   Explain how to enable hooks: `git config core.hooksPath .githooks`.
    *   Explain the commit message convention (Conventional Commits).
    *   Mention the pre-commit checks (trailing whitespace, shellcheck).

2.  **Update `docs/README.md`**:
    *   Briefly mention the contribution guidelines and link to `docs/QUICK-REF.md`.

3.  **Verify**:
    *   Ensure links are correct and formatting is consistent.

Use `attempt_completion` when done.
</task>

  1 | # Media Stack Quick Reference
  2 | Start here: [docs/INDEX.md](docs/INDEX.md:1)
  3 | Reading order: 1/8 â€¢ Essential
  4 | 
  5 | **ğŸ¯ RAPID CONTEXT**: Podman-based media automation stack with VPN protection, automated downloads, and media streaming. All traffic routed through AirVPN with static WireGuard configuration.
  6 | 
  7 | ## ğŸ“– Project Overview
  8 | 
  9 | **What it does**: Complete automated media pipeline from search â†’ download â†’ organize â†’ stream, all through secure VPN tunnel.
 10 | 
 11 | **Core Tech Stack**: Podman containers + AirVPN (WireGuard) + qBittorrent + Sonarr/Radarr + Jellyfin + static port forwarding.
 12 | 
 13 | **Key Innovation**: Static AirVPN WireGuard configuration from Config Generator, eliminating dynamic config generation complexity.

 16 | 
 17 | ## ğŸ¯ Critical File Priority (READ FIRST)

 19 | ### **ğŸ”¥ ESSENTIAL** (Start here for any issue)
 20 | 1. **[core/podman-compose.yml](core/podman-compose.yml:1)** - Main service definitions, dependencies, networking

 25 | 4. **[scripts/podman-up.sh](scripts/podman-up.sh:1)** - Stack startup script
 26 | 5. **[maintenance/quick-debug.sh](maintenance/quick-debug.sh:1)** - Fast troubleshooting
 27 | 6. **[scripts/podman-logs.sh](scripts/podman-logs.sh:1)** - Log viewing utility

 30 | 7. **[docs/README.md](docs/README.md:1)** - Complete documentation (996 lines)
 31 | 8. **[docs/PODMAN.md](docs/PODMAN.md:1)** - Podman-specific setup guide
 32 | 9. **[docs/AIRVPN-VALIDATION-CHECKLIST.md](docs/AIRVPN-VALIDATION-CHECKLIST.md:1)** - AirVPN validation guide
 33 | 10. **[services/gluetun/servers.json](services/gluetun/servers.json:1)** - AirVPN server configurations
 34 | 
 35 | ---
 36 | 
 37 | ## âš¡ Essential Commands
 38 | 
 39 | ### **Core Operations**
 40 | ```bash
 41 | # Start entire stack
 42 | ./scripts/podman-up.sh
 43 | 
 44 | # Stop stack  
 45 | ./scripts/podman-down.sh
 46 | 
 47 | # View all logs
 48 | ./scripts/podman-logs.sh
 49 | 
 50 | # Health check (MOST IMPORTANT)
 51 | ./maintenance/maintenance.sh health
 52 | ```
 53 | 
 54 | ### **Debug & Troubleshooting**
 55 | ```bash
 56 | # Enable debug mode
 57 | ./maintenance/maintenance.sh debug-enable
 58 | 
 59 | # Quick health check
 60 | ./maintenance/quick-debug.sh
 61 | 
 62 | # VPN troubleshooting
 63 | ./maintenance/maintenance.sh troubleshoot-vpn
 64 | 
 65 | # Full diagnostic collection
 66 | ./maintenance/maintenance.sh diagnostic
 67 | ```
 68 | 
 69 | ### **Manual Podman Commands**
 70 | ```bash
 71 | # Start with compose
 72 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml up -d
 73 | 
 74 | # View specific service logs
 75 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs -f gluetun
 76 | 
 77 | # Check service status
 78 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml ps
 79 | 
 80 | # Test VPN IP
 81 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec gluetun wget -qO- https://ipinfo.io
 82 | ```
 83 | 
 84 | ### **Emergency/Recovery**
 85 | ```bash
 86 | # Restart VPN service
 87 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml restart gluetun
 88 | 
 89 | # Full restart with fresh configs
 90 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml down && podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml up -d --force-recreate
 91 | 
 92 | # Clean up everything
 93 | podman system prune -af
 94 | ```
 95 | 
 96 | ---
 97 | 
 98 | ## ğŸ—ï¸ Service Architecture (Simplified)
 99 | 
100 | ### **Dependency Chain**
101 | ```
102 | gluetun (AirVPN) â†’ qbittorrent â†’ media services
103 |       â†“               â†“             â†“
104 |    VPN+PF         Downloads    Organization
105 | ```
106 | 
107 | ### **Critical Services & Ports**
108 | | Service | Port | Purpose | Health Check |
109 | |---------|------|---------|--------------|
110 | | **gluetun** | - | VPN gateway | `wget -qO- https://ipinfo.io` |
111 | | **qbittorrent** | 8080 | Downloads | `curl http://localhost:8080` |
112 | | **prowlarr** | 9696 | Indexers | `curl http://localhost:9696` |
113 | | **sonarr** | 8989 | TV Shows | `curl http://localhost:8989` |
114 | | **radarr** | 7878 | Movies | `curl http://localhost:7878` |
115 | | **jellyfin** | 8096 | Media Player | `curl http://localhost:8096` |
116 | 
117 | ### **Key Environment Variables**
118 | ```bash
119 | # REQUIRED (from core/.env)
120 | AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_PRIVATE_KEY=your_private_key_here    # From AirVPN Config Generator
121 | AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_ADDRESSES=your_addresses_here        # From AirVPN Config Generator
122 | QBIT_USER=admin                                       # qBittorrent web UI user
123 | QBIT_PASS=secure_password                            # qBittorrent web UI password
124 | 
125 | # IMPORTANT
126 | AIRVPN_PORT_FORWARDING=true                          # Enable AirVPN port forwarding
127 | AIRVPN_SERVER_COUNTRIES=SG                          # Preferred server countries (Singapore for Vietnam)
128 | DEBUG=false                                          # Enable debug logging (set true for troubleshooting)
129 | ```
130 | 
131 | ---
132 | 
133 | ## ğŸš¨ Common Issues & Quick Fixes
134 | 
135 | ### **VPN Connection Failed**
136 | ```bash
137 | # Check AirVPN WireGuard configuration
138 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs gluetun
139 | 
140 | # Verify AirVPN credentials in core/.env
141 | grep -E "(AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_PRIVATE_KEY|AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_ADDRESSES)" core/.env
142 | 
143 | # Restart VPN service
144 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml restart gluetun
145 | ```
146 | 
147 | ### **Port Forwarding Not Working**
148 | ```bash
149 | # Check AirVPN port forwarding status
150 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs gluetun | grep -i "port"
151 | 
152 | # Verify AIRVPN_PORT_FORWARDING=true in core/.env
153 | grep AIRVPN_PORT_FORWARDING core/.env
154 | 
155 | # Check AirVPN account port forwarding settings
156 | # Visit: https://airvpn.org/client/ â†’ Forwarded Ports
157 | ```
158 | 
159 | ### **Downloads Stuck/Slow**
160 | ```bash
161 | # Check qBittorrent connectivity
162 | curl http://localhost:8080
163 | 
164 | # Verify VPN IP is different from host
165 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec gluetun wget -qO- https://ipinfo.io
166 | 
167 | # Check available disk space
168 | df -h /media/Storage
169 | ```
170 | 
171 | ### **Services Not Accessible**
172 | ```bash
173 | # Check all service status
174 | ./maintenance/maintenance.sh health
175 | 
176 | # Restart specific service
177 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml restart SERVICE_NAME
178 | 
179 | # Check if ports are bound correctly
180 | podman port --all
181 | ```
182 | 
183 | ### **Debug Workflow**
184 | 1. **Quick Check**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh health`
185 | 2. **Enable Debug**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh debug-enable` 
186 | 3. **Restart Services**: `podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml restart`
187 | 4. **Collect Logs**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh diagnostic`
188 | 5. **Check Specific Issue**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh troubleshoot-vpn`
189 | 
190 | ---
191 | 
192 | ## âš™ï¸ Configuration Essentials
193 | 
194 | ### **Must-Configure Variables** ([core/.env.example](core/.env.example:1))
195 | ```bash
196 | # Copy and edit
197 | cp core/.env.example .env
198 | 
199 | # REQUIRED - AirVPN Account
200 | AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_PRIVATE_KEY=your_private_key_here
201 | AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_ADDRESSES=your_addresses_here
202 | 
203 | # REQUIRED - qBittorrent Web UI  
204 | QBIT_USER=admin
205 | QBIT_PASS=secure_password
206 | 
207 | # RECOMMENDED
208 | AIRVPN_PORT_FORWARDING=true       # Better download speeds
209 | AIRVPN_SERVER_COUNTRIES=SG        # Optimal server selection (Singapore for Vietnam)
210 | DEBUG=false                       # Enable for troubleshooting
211 | ```
212 | 
213 | ### **AirVPN Setup Guide**
214 | 1. **Create Account**: Visit https://airvpn.org/
215 | 2. **Purchase Subscription**: Choose your plan
216 | 3. **Access Config Generator**: Client Area â†’ Config Generator
217 | 4. **Select WireGuard**: Choose WireGuard protocol
218 | 5. **Choose Servers**: Singapore recommended for Vietnam users
219 | 6. **Generate Config**: Extract PrivateKey and Address values
220 | 7. **Configure Port Forwarding**: Client Area â†’ Forwarded Ports (optional)
221 | 
222 | ### **Important Paths**
223 | | Path | Purpose | Notes |
224 | |------|---------|-------|
225 | | `/media/Storage/downloads` | qBittorrent downloads | Must exist, adequate space |
226 | | `/media/Storage/movies` | Radarr movie library | Jellyfin serves from here |
227 | | `/media/Storage/tv-shows` | Sonarr TV library | Jellyfin serves from here |
228 | | `./core/` | Core configuration files | Contains podman-compose.yml, .env |
229 | | `./services/gluetun/` | AirVPN configurations | Contains servers.json |
230 | 
231 | ### **Security Considerations**
232 | - **Strong passwords**: Use unique passwords for all services
233 | - **AirVPN credentials**: Keep secure, enable 2FA if available
234 | - **File permissions**: Ensure media directories accessible
235 | - **Debug mode**: Disable in production (may expose sensitive info)
236 | - **VPN verification**: Always verify external IP differs from host
237 | - **WireGuard keys**: Never share your private key
238 | 
239 | ---
240 | 
241 | ## ğŸ” Health Check Commands
242 | 
243 | ### **Quick Status**
244 | ```bash
245 | # Overall health (BEST FIRST CHECK)
246 | ./maintenance/maintenance.sh health
247 | 
248 | # Service status
249 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml ps
250 | 
251 | # Resource usage
252 | podman stats --no-stream
253 | ```
254 | 
255 | ### **VPN Verification**
256 | ```bash
257 | # Check VPN IP
258 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec gluetun wget -qO- https://ipinfo.io
259 | 
260 | # Test port forwarding (if enabled)
261 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs gluetun | grep -i "port"
262 | 
263 | # VPN logs
264 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs -f gluetun | grep -E "(VPN|connection|port)"
265 | ```
266 | 
267 | ### **Service Connectivity**
268 | ```bash
269 | # Test internal connectivity
270 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec sonarr curl http://prowlarr:9696
271 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec radarr curl http://gluetun:8080
272 | 
273 | # Test web interfaces
274 | curl -I http://localhost:9696  # Prowlarr
275 | curl -I http://localhost:8096  # Jellyfin
276 | ```
277 | 
278 | ---
279 | 
280 | ## ğŸ¯ Quick Start Checklist
281 | 
282 | ### **Setup** (First Time)
283 | - [ ] Clone repository
284 | - [ ] `cp core/.env.example .env` and configure AirVPN credentials
285 | - [ ] `mkdir -p /media/Storage/{downloads,movies,tv-shows}`
286 | - [ ] `./scripts/podman-up.sh`
287 | - [ ] `./maintenance/maintenance.sh health`
288 | 
289 | ### **Daily Operations**
290 | - [ ] Check health: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh health`
291 | - [ ] Monitor logs: `./scripts/podman-logs.sh`
292 | - [ ] Verify VPN: `podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec gluetun wget -qO- https://ipinfo.io`
293 | 
294 | ### **Weekly Maintenance**
295 | - [ ] `./maintenance/maintenance.sh cleanup`
296 | - [ ] Update containers: `podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml pull && podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml up -d`
297 | - [ ] Check AirVPN account status at https://airvpn.org/client/
298 | 
299 | ---
300 | 
301 | **ğŸš€ TIP**: Start with `./maintenance/maintenance.sh health` for any issue. It covers 90% of common problems and provides specific guidance for failures. Enable `DEBUG=true` in [core/.env](core/.env:1) when troubleshooting complex issues.

## ğŸ’» Development & Contributing

### **Setup**
```bash
# Enable Git hooks (Required for contributors)
git config core.hooksPath .githooks
```

### **Commit Convention**
We follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) structure: `<type>(<scope>): <description>`

**Types:**
- `feat`: New feature
- `fix`: Bug fix
- `docs`: Documentation only
- `style`: Formatting, missing semi-colons, etc.
- `refactor`: Code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
- `chore`: Maintenance, build process, auxiliary tools

**Example:** `feat(vpn): add new server location support`

### **Pre-commit Checks**
The configured hooks will automatically verify:
- **Whitespace**: No trailing whitespace allowed.
- **Shellcheck**: Validates shell scripts for errors and best practices.
- **Commit Message**: Enforces the conventional commit format.

161 | # Check qBittorrent connectivity

166 |

169 | ```

171 | ### **Services Not Accessible**
172 | ```bash

175 |

178 |

185 | 2. **Enable Debug**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh debug-enable` 
186 | 3. **Restart Services**: `podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml restart`
187 | 4. **Collect Logs**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh diagnostic`
188 | 5. **Check Specific Issue**: `./maintenance/maintenance.sh troubleshoot-vpn`

192 | ## âš™ï¸ Configuration Essentials
193 | 
194 | ### **Must-Configure Variables** ([core/.env.example](core/.env.example:1))
195 | ```bash
196 | # Copy and edit
197 | cp core/.env.example .env
198 | 
199 | # REQUIRED - AirVPN Account
200 | AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_PRIVATE_KEY=your_private_key_here
201 | AIRVPN_WIREGUARD_ADDRESSES=your_addresses_here
202 | 
203 | # REQUIRED - qBittorrent Web UI  
204 | QBIT_USER=admin
205 | QBIT_PASS=secure_password
206 | 
207 | # RECOMMENDED
208 | AIRVPN_PORT_FORWARDING=true       # Better download speeds
209 | AIRVPN_SERVER_COUNTRIES=SG        # Optimal server selection (Singapore for Vietnam)
210 | DEBUG=false                       # Enable for troubleshooting
211 | ```
212 | 
213 | ### **AirVPN Setup Guide**
214 | 1. **Create Account**: Visit https://airvpn.org/
215 | 2. **Purchase Subscription**: Choose your plan
216 | 3. **Access Config Generator**: Client Area â†’ Config Generator
217 | 4. **Select WireGuard**: Choose WireGuard protocol
218 | 5. **Choose Servers**: Singapore recommended for Vietnam users
219 | 6. **Generate Config**: Extract PrivateKey and Address values
220 | 7. **Configure Port Forwarding**: Client Area â†’ Forwarded Ports (optional)
221 | 
222 | ### **Important Paths**
223 | | Path | Purpose | Notes |
224 | |------|---------|-------|
225 | | `/media/Storage/downloads` | qBittorrent downloads | Must exist, adequate space |
226 | | `/media/Storage/movies` | Radarr movie library | Jellyfin serves from here |
227 | | `/media/Storage/tv-shows` | Sonarr TV library | Jellyfin serves from here |
228 | | `./core/` | Core configuration files | Contains podman-compose.yml, .env |
229 | | `./services/gluetun/` | AirVPN configurations | Contains servers.json |
230 | 
231 | ### **Security Considerations**
232 | - **Strong passwords**: Use unique passwords for all services
233 | - **AirVPN credentials**: Keep secure, enable 2FA if available
234 | - **File permissions**: Ensure media directories accessible
235 | - **Debug mode**: Disable in production (may expose sensitive info)
236 | - **VPN verification**: Always verify external IP differs from host
237 | - **WireGuard keys**: Never share your private key

250 | 
251 | # Resource usage
252 | podman stats --no-stream
253 | ```

255 | ### **VPN Verification**
256 | ```bash
257 | # Check VPN IP

259 | 
260 | # Test port forwarding (if enabled)
261 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs gluetun | grep -i "port"
262 | 
263 | # VPN logs
264 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml logs -f gluetun | grep -E "(VPN|connection|port)"
265 | ```

267 | ### **Service Connectivity**
268 | ```bash

270 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec sonarr curl http://prowlarr:9696
271 | podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec radarr curl http://gluetun:8080
272 |

275 | curl -I http://localhost:8096  # Jellyfin
276 | ```

283 | ```bash
284 | # Enable Git hooks (Required for contributors)
285 | git config core.hooksPath .githooks
286 | ```
287 | 
288 | ### **Commit Convention**
289 | We follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) structure: `<type>(<scope>): <description>`
290 | 
291 | **Types:**
292 | - `feat`: New feature
293 | - `fix`: Bug fix
294 | - `docs`: Documentation only
295 | - `style`: Formatting, missing semi-colons, etc.
296 | - `refactor`: Code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
297 | - `chore`: Maintenance, build process, auxiliary tools
298 | 
299 | **Example:** `feat(vpn): add new server location support`
300 | 
301 | ### **Pre-commit Checks**
302 | The configured hooks will automatically verify:
303 | - **Whitespace**: No trailing whitespace allowed.
304 | - **Shellcheck**: Validates shell scripts for errors and best practices.
305 | - **Commit Message**: Enforces the conventional commit format.
306 |

310 | 
311 | ### **Setup** (First Time)
312 | - [ ] Clone repository
313 | - [ ] `cp core/.env.example .env` and configure AirVPN credentials
314 | - [ ] `mkdir -p /media/Storage/{downloads,movies,tv-shows}`
315 | - [ ] `./scripts/podman-up.sh`
316 | - [ ] `./maintenance/maintenance.sh health`
317 | 
318 | ### **Daily Operations**

320 | - [ ] Monitor logs: `./scripts/podman-logs.sh`
321 | - [ ] Verify VPN: `podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml exec gluetun wget -qO- https://ipinfo.io`
322 | 
323 | ### **Weekly Maintenance**
324 | - [ ] `./maintenance/maintenance.sh cleanup`
325 | - [ ] Update containers: `podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml pull && podman-compose -f core/podman-compose.yml up -d`
326 | - [ ] Check AirVPN account status at https://airvpn.org/client/
327 |
